guarantee.disclaimer: The content of this website shall not be understood as an analysis of any securities, advertising material, proposed purchase or sale, offer or recommendation of any financial or investment assets. This content is for informational purposes only and does not consider the investment objectives, financial conditions or particular and specific needs of any investors. The opinions expressed in the course material may change at any time. The opinions are based on the date of their presentation and do not consider any fact that may have arisen after this date. Read the supplementary information form, the essential information sheet, if any, and the regulation before you register.

everyLevel.title: Courses for Every Experience Level
everyLevel.content: Whether you're just starting out or looking to refine your skills, our courses are designed to meet you where you are. From beginner fundamentals to advanced strategies, we have a path for everyone.

experts.title: Learn from Market Experts
experts.content: Our instructors are seasoned traders with years of real-world experience. They don't just teach theory – they share practical insights from their own successful trading careers.

moreThan.title: More Than Just Education
moreThan.content: Join a community of like-minded traders. Get access to live trading sessions, exclusive market analysis, and a supportive network that helps you grow every step of the way.

testimonials.title: What Our Students Say
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands of successful traders who transformed their careers with our courses

lucas.name: Lucas Fernandes
lucas.text: This course completely changed my approach to trading. The mentorship and community support are invaluable. I went from losing money to consistently profitable within 6 months.

mariana.name: Mariana Lima
mariana.text: The best investment I ever made in my trading career. The strategies taught here are practical and actually work. The instructors are always available to help.

gabriel.name: Gabriel Pereira
gabriel.text: I was skeptical at first, but the results speak for themselves. The risk management training alone was worth the price. Highly recommend to anyone serious about trading.

larissa.name: Larissa Martins
larissa.text: Outstanding course material and excellent support. The live trading sessions helped me understand how professionals think and make decisions in real-time.

cta.badge: INVEST IN YOUR FINANCIAL EDUCATION TODAY
cta.text: Register for our training program and journey towards a professional trading career.

faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our courses and services

0.question: What is included in the course?
0.answer: Our comprehensive courses include video lessons, live trading sessions, community access, trading tools, and personal mentorship depending on your chosen plan. All materials are accessible 24/7 on any device.

1.question: Do I need prior trading experience?
1.answer: No prior experience is required. Our courses are designed to take you from complete beginner to confident trader. We start with the fundamentals and progressively build your knowledge and skills.

2.question: How long do I have access to the course?
2.answer: Once you purchase a plan, you have lifetime access to all the course materials included in your tier. This includes any future updates and additions to the curriculum.

3.question: Can I upgrade my plan later?
3.answer: Yes! You can upgrade to a higher tier at any time. You will only pay the difference between your current plan and the new plan. Contact our support team for assistance.

4.question: What payment methods do you accept?
4.answer: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, and PayPal. All payments are processed securely through our payment partners with bank-level encryption.

5.question: How does the money-back guarantee work?
5.answer: If you are not satisfied with your purchase within the first 7 days, simply contact our support team for a full refund. No questions asked, no hidden conditions.

metadata.title: Mentor do Rendimento | Trading Education Platform
metadata.description: Study. Practice. Trade. Take the road towards an excellent trading career with professional education, innovative tools, and a supportive community.

guarantee.title: 7-Day Money-Back Guarantee
guarantee.content: We stand behind the quality of our courses. If you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, you may request a full refund within 7 days of your initial purchase date. No questions asked, no hidden conditions.

eligibility.title: Eligibility Requirements
eligibility.content: To be eligible for a refund, you must submit your request within 7 calendar days from the date of purchase. The refund applies to your first purchase only. Refund requests for renewed subscriptions or upgraded plans are evaluated on a case-by-case basis by our support team.

process.title: Refund Process
process.content: To request a refund, please contact our support team at support@mentordorendimento.com with your account email and purchase details. Refunds are processed within 5-10 business days and will be returned to your original payment method. You will receive a confirmation email once your refund has been processed.

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.content: Refunds are not available for purchases made more than 7 days ago, promotional or discounted plans where explicitly stated, or accounts that have been flagged for abuse of the refund policy. Downloaded materials and certificates of completion are non-refundable once issued.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about our refund policy or need assistance with a refund request, please reach out to our support team at support@mentordorendimento.com. We are available 24/7 to help you.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using the Mentor do Rendimento platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you must not use our services. These terms apply to all users, including visitors, registered members, and subscribers.

services.title: 2. Description of Services
services.content: Mentor do Rendimento provides online trading education, including video courses, live sessions, community access, and mentorship programs. Our services are educational in nature and do not constitute financial advice. We do not guarantee any specific trading results or returns on investment.

accounts.title: 3. User Accounts
accounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. Each account is for individual use only and may not be shared with others. You must provide accurate and complete information during registration. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.

intellectual.title: 4. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content on this platform, including courses, videos, text, graphics, and software, is the property of Mentor do Rendimento and is protected by copyright laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, or create derivative works from our content without express written permission.

payment.title: 5. Payment Terms
payment.content: All prices are displayed in the applicable currency and include relevant taxes. Payment is due at the time of purchase. We accept major credit cards, debit cards, and PayPal. Subscription plans auto-renew unless cancelled before the renewal date. See our Refund Policy for information about cancellations.

disclaimer.title: 6. Trading Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: Trading in financial markets involves substantial risk and is not suitable for every investor. Past performance is not indicative of future results. The educational content provided is for informational purposes only. You should consult with a qualified financial advisor before making any investment decisions. Mentor do Rendimento is not responsible for any trading losses.

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Mentor do Rendimento shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of our services. Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid for the service in question. We do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free access to our platform.

changes.title: 8. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. Your continued use of our services after changes are posted constitutes acceptance of the modified terms. We encourage you to review this page periodically.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect personal information that you provide directly to us, including your name, email address, phone number, and payment information when you register for an account or purchase a plan. We also automatically collect certain information about your device and how you interact with our platform, including IP address, browser type, and usage patterns.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use the information we collect to provide and improve our services, process transactions, send you course updates and communications, personalize your learning experience, and ensure the security of your account. We may also use your information to send promotional materials, which you can opt out of at any time.

protection.title: Data Protection
protection.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information, including SSL encryption for data transmission, secure storage of payment information through PCI-compliant processors, and regular security audits. We restrict access to personal information to authorized personnel only.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze platform usage, and deliver personalized content. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences. Essential cookies are required for the platform to function properly, while analytics and marketing cookies are optional.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We may share your information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our platform, processing payments, and analyzing usage. These providers are contractually obligated to protect your information. We do not sell your personal data to third parties for marketing purposes.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information at any time. You may also request a copy of the data we hold about you or ask us to restrict processing. To exercise any of these rights, please contact our support team. We will respond to your request within 30 days.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy practices, please contact us at support@mentordorendimento.com. Our data protection team is available to address any inquiries regarding the handling of your personal information.

accountPage.title: My Account
accountPage.subtitle: Access your courses and manage your subscription.

benefits.title: Member Benefits
benefits.courses: Access to all purchased courses and materials, available 24/7 on any device.
benefits.community: Exclusive community access with fellow traders and mentors.
benefits.support: Priority customer support and personalized guidance.
benefits.updates: Lifetime updates to course content and new materials as they are released.
